extensionDescription.message: Adds context menu item 'Bookmark Tab Here' to Bookmarks Menus as an alternative bookmarking method.

BTH_menuitemText.description: Text of BTH context menu item.

BTH_newFolderQ.description: Editor dialog text: for specifing name of new subfolder

BTH_titleEdit.description: Editor dialog text: for specifing name of new bookmark

BTH_placeholder.description: Editor dialog: Placeholder text to cue entering desired name of new subfolder

BTH_cancelHint.description: Editor dialog: Substitutes for Cancel button

BTH_warning.message: No further Bookmark Tab Here actions are possible while this previous editor window is open. Please interact with it first, then try again.
BTH_warning.description: Warning to user due to previous editor dialog ignored
